evidence.claim: Netsmart utilizes Amazon Web Services (AWS) for its cloud infrastructure.
The company implements FHIR standards to support healthcare data exchange.
Integration using HL7 messaging standards is a core feature in their solutions.
Netsmart supports various EDI transaction sets for compliance with healthcare standards.
They provide secure APIs that comply with HIPAA regulations.

icp.icp_reason: Pioneer in healthcare integration; aligns with X12 and claims management.
